title.narrative: Support to Directorate for EU Integrations (DEI) in BiH
Support to Directorate for EU Integrations (DEI) in BiH

description.narrative: Arbetets omfattning genom detta projekt är att stärka Direktoratet för europeisk integration (DEI)/ Nationell IPA-koordinator / NIPAC kapacitet för att effektivt samordna och genomföra olika arbetsprocesser relaterade till användadet av EU-medel för att stödja den pågående EU-anslutningsinriktade reformen

The scope of the work that will be implemented through this project is to strengthen the capacities of the DEI/NIPAC Office to effectively and efficiently coordinate and implement different working processes related to EU funds utilisation following the sector approach in supporting the on-going accession oriented reforms

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Specific Agreement between DEI/NIPAC and Sweden was signed in February 2018 however the Project become effective as of September 2018. Main reason for the 7 months delay was a long procurement procedure for two consultants, envisaged in the Project proposal, as well as internal restructuring of the DEI/NIPAC office in terms of assigning staff responsible for implementation of the project. However, from September 2019 the project is proceeding in accordance to the plan and both consultants are fully engaged in support of the DEI/NIPAC office. During the reporting period (4months) the following main activities and results have been achieved: - Support to the implementation of IPA planning and programming processes - through revision of Sector Planning Documents 2018-2020 (SPD 2018-2020) that serve as a basis for the programming process ;- Support in preparation for programming of IPA 2019 and IPA 2020 national programmes (initial draft of the Action Document (EU4 Energy);- Preparation of reports/ analyses required for IPA II planning and programming. - Assessment of actual needs for strategic communication relating issues for IPA II utilization - Preparation of strategic messages for target audience to include benefits and consequences as regards IPA II utilization. - Analyses of interests and target groups/audiences
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
